name: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc.
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance, founded in 1901, operates one of the largest retail pharmacy chains globally with over 8,700 U.S. stores. The company provides prescription services, health and wellness products, and operates through segments including U.S. Retail Pharmacy, International, and U.S. Healthcare. In 2025, it announced plans to close underperforming stores and transition to private ownership through a $10 billion deal with Sycamore Partners.
